Barack Obama !( CNN)-- Rudy Giuliani Secretary of State Colin Powell announced Sunday that he will be voting for Barack Obama , citing the Democrat's "ability to inspire" and the "inclusive nature of his campaign." I think he is a transformational figure, he is a new generation coming onto the world stage, onto the American stage, and for that reason I'll be voting for Barack Obama , Colin Powell said on NBC's "Meet the Press." Alan Mulally said Ford has learned that it has to deal with the current reality. You have to match production to real demand and accelerate development of new products that people will want to buy. For Ford that meant going with a plan for extensive restructuring to a consortium of banks and borrowing$ 23.5 billion, he said. For GM and Chrysler it meant bankruptcy filings and huge bailouts
